ProjectTitle: Function of PERK in T cell metabolic reprogramming: deciphering its role as ER stress sensor vs its novel role as coordinator of membrane contact sites
InitialFeedbackHistory:
22/05/2023
Please indicate that the samples and materials that you will use consist of both digital and physical data and give an estimation of the physical volume, do these need special management and storage under specific conditions, cold storage for samples for example, is there enough space? 
Later in the DMP you also mention the use of human cell lines, these are also considered human bodily material, if you have not done so already please register the use of these cells at the UZL ethical committee, and submit and updated DMP with approval number as intermediate. For more information see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial
If you like to discuss the use of MIBBI standards for your work further, please contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be
